Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I am a relatively new player of KSP but already an addict. I love modular construction games, I love spaceships, I love baffling mission statements. It's like my Venn diagram sweet-spot!

I hope to pick up titbits of information from those of you with crazier ideas than my own, and hopefully in time share some helpful tips of my own. I am in the process of learning video editing and enjoy making game tutorials so I am sure I will speak to some of you in the relevant forum subsection for such things

For now, I shall continue my mission to Dres. It's the one I've been putting off the longest, though I just can't work out why...
Hi! Dres is kind of an inside joke on the forums that it is the "forgotten planet". If it weren't for the asteroids around it, I don't think anyone would realize it was there.

Hello Totalologist and welcome to the forum!

Poor Dres, the lonely space potato.  I'm actually just planning my first crewed mission to Dres, myself.

Happy landings!
Give Dres love!!! Not one mission to Dres, a fleet of Dres awareness! The transfer window to Dres is before duna so I'm going there (if my rockets can stop exploding)
